Literature.Title: Structural and Biofunctional Insights into the Cyclo(Pro-Pro-Phe-Phe-) Scaffold from Experimental and In Silico Studies: Melanoma and Beyond
Literature.Author: Bojarska J, Breza M, Jaremko M, Czyz M, Gajos-Michniewicz A, Zimecki M, Kaczmarek K, Madura ID, Wojciechowski JM, Wolf WM

Literature.Title: Antiviral Activity of a Cyclic Pro-Pro- β3-HoPhe-Phe Tetrapeptide against HSV-1 and HAdV-5
Literature.Author: Zaczyńska E, Kaczmarek K, Zabrocki J, Artym J, Zimecki M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human melanoma DMBC28(10-20% Killing=50µM),Human melanoma DMBC29(10-20% Killing=50µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(no activity data),Human Adenovirus AdV-5(IC50 REP=>25µg/ml),HSV-1(IC50 REP=>25µg/ml)
